api_list.api_description: Get current USD prices of multiple tokens on a network.

required_parameters.name: network
required_parameters.description: The blockchain network to get token prices from.

required_parameters.name: addresses
required_parameters.description: Comma-separated token addresses to retrieve prices for.

api_list.api_description: Get ticker information for all or requested markets.

optional_parameters.name: pair
optional_parameters.description: Asset pair to get data for.

query: What is the current price of Ethereum in USD on the Ethereum network? Also, get the ticker information for the ETHUSD pair on Kraken.
